Ancient Civilizations.name: Echoes of the Past: A Civilizations Challenge
Ancient Civilizations.description: Delve into the fascinating world of ancient civilizations! This quiz explores the innovations, beliefs, and legacies of societies long gone. Test your knowledge of Mesopotamia, Egypt, Greece, Rome, and beyond. Are you ready to uncover the secrets of the past?

questions.text: The Code of Hammurabi, a significant legal text from ancient Mesopotamia, is most notable for its:
questions.hint: Think about the principle of justice and retribution in early legal systems.
questions.option2: A comprehensive list of deities and their roles.
questions.option4: The principle of 'an eye for an eye' and standardized punishments.

questions.text: Which of the following best describes the primary purpose of the Egyptian pyramids?
